name: earthmover
description:
An interactive story made in twine.

Cat spends every day drinking and partying with her friends, going out to clubs and living a care-free life. But she feels that something needs to change. And the surrounding forests of Riamhland City pique her curiosity.

'earthmover' is an interactive story with choices for you to explore different dialogues. It should be said that in this version, previous choices do not decide the ending.

Click on the embed to load the game. Click on blue highlighted text to make a choice.

Music:

The ambient track is made by myself, using samples from freesound, beepbox and sounds I recorded myself. It is inspired by Burial's Antidawn.
